anya-e0813n3:2: 202. Nāmānaṃ samāso yuttatthotyadhikāro. Samāsoti bhinnatthānaṃ padāna mekatthatā. Yuttatthoti aññamaññasambandhattho.
anya-e0813n3:7: Bhinnappavattinimittā saddā ekasmiṃ vatthuni pavattā tulyādhikaraṇā, visesanavisesassabhūtā samānādhikaraṇā dve padā yadā samasyante, tadā so samāso kammadhārayo
anya-e0813n3:8: Nāma , idha vā samāsasuttāni saññādvārena samāsavidhāyakāni.
anya-e0813n3:9: Aggahitavisesanā buddhi visessamhi na uppajjatīti visesanaṃ pubbaṃ hoti, samāseneva tulyādhikaraṇattassa vuttattā tappakāsanatthaṃ payuttā samāsato atirittā ca so iccete ‘‘vuttaṭṭhānamappayogo’’ti ñāyā nappayujjante. Evamaññatra.
anya-e0813n3:11: Tesaṃ yuttatthānaṃ samāsānaṃ pubbuttarapadānaṃ vibhattī lupyante, cakārena kvaci na.
anya-e0813n3:12: Tato mahanta vīra iti ca rūpappasaṅge –
anya-e0813n3:14: Vibhattīsu luttāsu sarantassa pubbabhūtassa, parabhūtassa ca assa samāsapadassa pakati hotītīha luttākārā punānīyante.
anya-e0813n3:18: Taddhitādayo nāmaṃ iva daṭṭhabbā taveppabhutipaccaye vajjetvā.
anya-e0813n3:20: 204. Kammadhārayo dvando ca, tappuriso ca lābhino.
anya-e0813n3:22: 205. Rattā ca sā paṭī cāti rattapaṭī, mahantī ca sā saddhā cāti mahāsaddhā. Ettha ‘‘kammadhārayasaññe ce’’ti pubbapade pumeva kate āīpaccayānaṃ nivutti.
anya-e0813n3:23: 206. Nīlañca taṃ uppalañcāti nīluppalaṃ, satthīva satthi, satthi ca sā sāmā cāti satthisāmā. Mukhameva cando mukhacando.
anya-e0813n3:24: Visesanavisessānaṃ yathecchattā kvaci visesanaṃ paraṃ hoti, khattiyabhūtoiccādi, icchā ca yathātanti.
anya-e0813n3:26: 207. Nasaddā si, tassa lopo. Na suro asuro.
anya-e0813n3:27: Ettha kammadhāraye kate – ‘‘ubhe tappurisā’’ti tappurisasaññā. ‘‘Attannassa tappurise’’ti nassa a. Na asso anasso. Ettha ‘‘sare ana’’ti nassa ana.
anya-e0813n3:28: 208. ‘‘Nāmānaṃ samāso’’ti sutte dvidhākate ayuttatthānampi kvaci samāso. Na puna geyyā apunageyyā gāthetyādi. Ettha geyyena sambandho na-saddo ayuttatthenāpi punena yogavibhāgabalā samasyate.
anya-e0813n3:31: Ettha ‘‘saṅkhyāpubbo digū’’ti kammadhārayassa digusaññā. ‘Digussekattaṃ’’ti ekattaṃ, napuṃsakattañca.
anya-e0813n3:35: Dutiyantādayo parapadehi nāmehi yadā samasyante, tadā so samāso tappuriso nāma.
anya-e0813n3:37: ‘‘Passa vāsiṭṭha gāmaṃ, gato tisso sāvatthiṃ’’tya trāyuttatthatāya na samāso. Tathā ññatra ñeyyaṃ.
anya-e0813n3:40: Tabba, anīya, ṇya, teyya, riccappaccayā kiccā. Thutinindatthamajjhāropitatthaṃ vacanaṃ adhikatthavacanaṃ. Soṇaleyyo kūpoiccādi. Soṇehi yathā liyhate, tathā puṇṇattā thuti. Tehi ucchiṭṭhattā nindā ca.
anya-e0813n3:41: Dadhinā upasittaṃ bhojanaṃ dadhibhojanaṃ, samāsapadeneva upasittakriyāya kathanā natthetthāyuttatthatā. Upasittasaddāppayogo pubbeva.
anya-e0813n3:43: 213. Buddhassa deyyaṃ buddhaddeyyaṃ, parassapadaṃ, ettha vibhatyalopo. Evaṃ attanopadamiccādi.
anya-e0813n3:46: ‘‘Brāhmaṇassa kaṇhā dantā’’ iccatra dantāpekkhā chaṭṭhīti kaṇhena sambandhābhāvā na samāso. Yadā tu kaṇhā ca te dantā ceti kammadhārayo, tadā chaṭṭhī kaṇhadantāpekkhāti brāhmaṇakaṇhadantāti samāso hoteva.
anya-e0813n3:47: 216. ‘‘Rañño māgadhassa dhana’’ ntyatra raññoti chaṭṭhī dhana mapekkhate, na māgadhaṃ. Rājā eva māgadhasaddena vuccateti bhedābhāvā sambandhābhāvoti tulyādhikaraṇena māgadhena saha rājā na samasyate. Dviṭṭho hi sambandho.
anya-e0813n3:48: Rañño asso puriso ce’’ tya tra rañño asso, rañño puriso ti ca paccekaṃ sambandhato sāpekkhatā atthīti na samāso. ‘‘Asso ca puriso cā’’ti dvande kate tu rājassapurisāti hoteva, aññānapekkhattā.
anya-e0813n3:50: Puttena saha samāso, gamakattā. Gamakattampi samāsassa nibandhanaṃ. Tattha garuno puttoti viggaho, evamaññatra.
anya-e0813n3:52: Kvaci nindāyaṃ - kūpe maṇḍūko viya kūpamaṇḍūko. Evaṃ nagarakāko iccādi. Atropamāya nindā gamyate.
anya-e0813n3:56: Appaṭhamantāna maññesaṃ padānaṃ atthesu dve vā bahūni vā nāmāni yadā samasyante, tadā so samāso bahubbīhi nāma.
anya-e0813n3:57: Āgatā samaṇā yaṃ sā āgatasamaṇo, vihāro.
anya-e0813n3:58: 219. Jitāni indriyāni yena so jitindriyo, bhagavā. Āhito aggi yena so āhitaggi. Agyāhito vātyādo yathecchaṃ visesanassa paratā.
anya-e0813n3:59: 220. Karaṇe tu-chinno rukkho yena so chinnarukkho, pharasu.
anya-e0813n3:60: 221. Dinno suṅko yassa so dinnasuṅko, rājā.
anya-e0813n3:61: 222. Niggatā janā yasmā so niggatajano, gāmo.
anya-e0813n3:62: 223. Dasa balāni yassa so dasabalo, bhagavā. Natthi samo yassa so asamo. Ettha ‘‘attannassā’’ti yogavibhāgena nassa a.
anya-e0813n3:63: Pahūtā jivhā yassa so pahūtajivho, mahantī paññā yassa so mahāpañño. Dvīsu ‘‘itthiyambhāsitapumitthīpumāva ce’’ti pumbhāvātidesā pubbuttarapadesu āīppaccayānamabhāvo.
anya-e0813n3:64: 224. ‘‘Kvaci samāsantagatānamakāranto’’ti antassa attaṃ. Kāraggahaṇena ā i ca. Itthiyamivaṇṇantā, tvantehi ca kappaccayopi. Yathā - visālaṃ akkhi yassa so visālakkho, paccakkhadhammā, silopo. Sobhano gandho yassa so sugandhi. Bahukantiko, bahunadiko, samuddo. Ettha yadādinā rasso. Bahukattuko. Mattā bahavo mātaṅgā yasmiṃ taṃ mattabahumātaṅgaṃ, vanaṃ.
anya-e0813n3:66: 225. Suvaṇṇassa viya vaṇṇo yassa so suvaṇṇavaṇṇo. Vajiraṃ pāṇimhi yassa so vajirapāṇi. Urasi lomāni yassa so urasilomo. Ettha vibhatyalopo.
anya-e0813n3:67: ‘‘Atthesū’’ti bahuttaggahaṇena kvaci paṭhamantānampi. Saha hetunā yo vattate so sahetuko, ‘‘yadā’’ dinā sahassa so.
anya-e0813n3:68: 226. Satta vā aṭṭha vā sattaṭṭha, māsā, etthaññapadattho vā saddassattho. Dakkhiṇassā ca pubbassā ca disāya yaṃ antarālaṃ, sā dakkhiṇapubbā, disā.
anya-e0813n3:70: Appaṭhamantānanti kiṃ, desito buddhena yo dhammo.
anya-e0813n3:73: Samuccayo , ti piṇḍīkaraṇaṃ ekavibhattikānaṃ nāmānaṃ yo samuccayo, so dvando nāma, idaṃ suttaṃ bahuvacanavisayaṃ.
anya-e0813n3:74: Cando ca sūriyo ca candasūriyā. Tiṭṭhanti tyādi-
anya-e0813n3:76: 228.Tathā dvande pāṇi turiya yogga senaṅga khuddajantuka vividha viruddha visabhāgatthādīnañca.
anya-e0813n3:77: Vividhenākārena viruddhā vividhaviruddhā, sabhāgā sadisā, vividhā ca te sabhāgā ceti visabhāgā. Yathā digusamāse, tathā dvande pāṇyaṅgatthādīnaṃ ekattaṃ, napuṃsakattañca hoti.
anya-e0813n3:78: Cakkhusotaṃ, gītavāditaṃ, yuganaṅgalaṃ, hatthassaṃ, asicammaṃ, ḍaṃsamakasaṃ, kokālūkaṃ.
anya-e0813n3:79: Nāmarūpaṃ , nāmaṃ namanalakkhaṇaṃ, rūpaṃ ruppanalakkhaṇaṃ. Evamete dhammā lakkhaṇato vividhā, paramatthato sabhāgā ca.
anya-e0813n3:80: Ādisaddenāññatthāpi . Yathā - bhinnaliṅgānaṃ - itthipumaṃ. Yadādinā rasso, dāsidāsaṃ, pattacīvaraṃ. Gaṅgāsoṇaṃ.
anya-e0813n3:86: 229.Vibhāsā rukkha tiṇa pasu dhana dhañña janapadādīnañca.
anya-e0813n3:87: Dvande rukkhādīnaṃ ekattaṃ napuṃsakattañca vā hoti.
anya-e0813n3:88: Dhavakhadiraṃ, dhavakhadirā, muñjapabbajaṃ, muñjapabbajā, ajeḷakaṃ, ajeḷakā, hiraññasuvaṇṇaṃ, hiraññasuvaṇṇāni, sāliyavaṃ, sāliyavā.
anya-e0813n3:90: Ādisaddena aññesupi vā. Yathā – niccavirodhīnamaddabbānaṃ - kusalākusalaṃ, kusalākusalāni.
anya-e0813n3:95: 230. Adhisaddā smiṃ, tassa lopo. Adhisaddena tulyādhikaraṇattā itthisaddāpismiṃ. Niccasamāsattā ādhārabhūtāyamitthiyanti padantarena viggaho. Adhi itthiyanti ṭhite –
anya-e0813n3:97: Upasaggādipubbako saddo vibhatyatthādīsu samāso hoti, abyayībhāvasañño ca.
anya-e0813n3:98: ‘‘So napuṃsakaliṅgo’’ti abyayībhāvo napuṃsakaliṅgo, yadādinā ekavacano ca.
anya-e0813n3:101: Anakārantā abyayībhāvā parā sabbā vibhattī lujjare. Adhitthi, vibhattīnamattho ādhārādi.
anya-e0813n3:102: Idhādhisaddo ādhārevattate, adhitthiiccetaṃ padaṃ itthiya miccetamatthaṃ vadati.
anya-e0813n3:103: Samīpaṃ nagarassa upanagaraṃ. ‘‘Aṃvibhattīnamakārantabyayībhāvā’’ti vibhattīnaṃ kvaci aṃ.
anya-e0813n3:105: Abhāvo makkhikānaṃ nimmakkhikaṃ rasso. Anupubbo therānaṃ anutheraṃ, anatikkamma sattiṃ yathāsatti.
anya-e0813n3:108: Ā pabbatā khettaṃ āpabbataṃ khettaṃ, mariyādāyaṃ, vajjamānā sīmā mariyādā, pabbataṃ vinātyattho.
anya-e0813n3:109: Ā jalantā sītaṃ ājalantaṃ sītaṃ, abhividhimhi, gayhamānā sīmā abhividhi, jalantena sahetyattho.
anya-e0813n3:111: 231. ‘‘Uttamo vīro pavīro’’ iccādo pana pubbapadatthappadhānattābhāvābyayībhāvābhāvo kammadhārayoeva. Evaṃ visiṭṭho dhammo abhidhammo. Kucchitaṃ annaṃ kadannaṃ. Etttha ‘‘kada kussā’’ti sare kussa kadādeso.
anya-e0813n3:112: Appakaṃ lavaṇaṃ kālavaṇaṃ, ettha ‘‘kāppatthesu cā’’ti kussa kā, bahuvacanenāññatrāpi kvaci. Kucchito puriso kāpuriso, kupuriso vā, evamasurādi.
anya-e0813n3:114: Kammadhārayaka tappurisā dve, dvendo ca bahubbīhi ca ñeyyā.
